title: Trade Unions to hand-over letter to President
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The National Trade Union Coordinating Center said that Government and private sector trade union leaders are due to hand over a letter to the President today (13), calling for his resignation.
Joint-convener of the National Trade Union Coordinating Center Wasantha Samarasinghe stated that trade union leaders also hope to file a complaint with the Inspector General of Police.
‘6.9 Mn voted to defeat Ranil, his appointment is a total disregard to that mandate,’ – Anura Kumara
Senior DIG Deshabandu at Human Rights Commission on Friday (13); HRCSL to summon Prisoners Rights Activists
